    • Method Detail

      • remove

        public void remove(Engine.GameObject obj)
        Remove a block from blockSet. If it doesn't exist in the blockSet, does nothing.
        Overrides:
        remove in class Engine.SetOfGameObjects<Block>
        Parameters:
        obj - - The object to remove.

      • getBlockAt

        public Block getBlockAt(int row,
                        int column)
        Returns a block at a row and column, Returns Null if outside of grid. Returns EmptyBlock if space is empty.
        Parameters:
        row - row number (top is 0, 0 to max-1)
        column - column number (left is 0, 0 to max-1)
        Returns:
        reference to the block at (row, column) if defined, otherwise, return null.

      • setBlockAt

        public Block setBlockAt(int row,
                        int column,
                        Block.BlockType type)
        Sets a block at position, [row][column] to type Returns a reference to created Block. Returns null if outside of grid.
        Parameters:
        row - row number, top is 0
        column - column number, left is 0
        type - one of defined block types.
        Returns:
        the reference to the newly created Block, if failed, returns null.

        public void clear()
